sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of AT&T ( T ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.2%.
Year to date, AT&T registers a 2.5% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Wal-Mart Stores ( WMT ), trading down 0.9%.
Wal-Mart Stores is showing a gain of 4.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.6%, and McDonald's Corp ( MCD ), trading up 1.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
